## SwitchProps interface

Props of [Switch](./react-native-material-kit.switch.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SwitchProps extends TouchableWithoutFeedbackProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [checked](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.checked.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Toggle status of the <code>Switch</code> |
|  [offColor](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.offcolor.md) | <code>string</code> | Color of the track, when switch is off |
|  [onCheckedChange](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.oncheckedchange.md) | <code>CheckedListener</code> | Callback when the toggle status is changed. |
|  [onColor](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.oncolor.md) | <code>string</code> | Color of the track, when switch is checked |
|  [rippleAniDuration](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.rippleaniduration.md) | <code>number</code> | Duration of the ripple effect, in milliseconds |
|  [rippleColor](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.ripplecolor.md) | <code>string</code> | Color of the ripple layer |
|  [thumbAniDuration](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.thumbaniduration.md) | <code>number</code> | Duration of the thumb sliding animation, in milliseconds |
|  [thumbOffColor](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.thumboffcolor.md) | <code>string</code> | Color of the thumb, when switch is off |
|  [thumbOnColor](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.thumboncolor.md) | <code>string</code> | Color of the thumb, when switch is checked |
|  [thumbRadius](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.thumbradius.md) | <code>number</code> | Radius of the thumb button |
|  [trackLength](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.tracklength.md) | <code>number</code> | The length of the Switch track |
|  [trackSize](./react-native-material-kit.switchprops.tracksize.md) | <code>number</code> | The thickness of the Switch track |
